hero.title: Learn languages by watching YouTube with Acquire Language
hero.subtitle: AI-powered subtitles, word definitions on hover, and a vocabulary notebook. Use your own AI provider for translations with zero markup.
hero.subtitleShort: Acquire Language: Learn while you watch.

features.title: What you get with Acquire Language
features.subtitle: Learn naturally with enhanced subtitles, instant definitions, and personalized vocabulary tracking.
features.enhancedSubtitlesDesc: Improved layout for YouTube captions with accurate translations powered by your chosen AI provider.
features.hoverDefinitionsDesc: Instant word meanings in context. Click to save words, examples, and notes to your notebook.
features.vocabularyNotebookDesc: Build your vocabulary over time with saved words and context from videos you watch.
features.flexibleAIDesc: Bring your own AI. Connect to multiple providers with zero markup or vendor lock-in.
features.openContributions: Open to new ideas and contributions
features.openContributionsDesc: Embracing a culture that is open to new ideas and contributions is integral fostering innovation, collaboration, and a dynamic user experience.

install.title: Install Acquire Language
install.subtitle: Now available on the Chrome Web Store. Click 'Add to Chrome' below to install. Microsoft Edge, Safari, and Firefox versions are coming soon.
install.contextAware: Context-Aware AI Explanations — Easier to Understand
install.contextAwareDesc: Do not know a word in the captions? Hover and click to get an instant, context-aware AI explanation tailored to your current level in the clearest way for you.
install.keepAskingDesc: Confused by a phrase or mixing up similar words? Ask follow-up questions in the same context and get the differences explained clearly.
install.dualCaptionsDesc: Sometimes you just want to relax and enjoy a movie or talk without language getting in the way. Acquire Language translates captions into your preferred language and shows dual subtitles so you can simply enjoy.
install.syncedNotebookDesc: Never lose what you have learned. Save words (with context), clips, and even audio. Sync to your favorite notes app and review anytime to reinforce memory.

setup.title: Set up Acquire Language
setup.step1Desc: Set the language you want to learn and your current proficiency level to better match your learning needs
setup.step2Desc: Open Settings -> AI Service to configure your own AI service
setup.step3Desc: Integrations to configure your own Eudic token to sync your vocabulary notebook to Eudic
setup.step4Desc: Open any YouTube video and enable subtitles
